bibl.title: Coins as Tools for Dating the Foundation of the Large East Church at Kellis: Problems and a Possible Solution.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Historical context. - The Large East Church at Kellis. - Coins from the Large East Church. - The methodology. - The hoards consulted. - The suggested foundation date for the Large East Church as determined by hoard composition. - The Christianization of the Oases.

bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: Gillian E. Bowen, Coins as Tools for Dating the Foundation of the Large East Church at Kellis: Problems and a Possible Solution.

Roger S. Bagnall, Paola Davoli & Colin A. Hope (edd.), assisted by Bruce E. Parr (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 15 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 417-428, 8 figg., 6 tabl.

Introduction. - Historical context. - The Large East Church at Kellis. - Coins from the Large East Church. - The methodology. - The hoards consulted. - The suggested foundation date for the Large East Church as determined by hoard composition. - The Christianization of the Oases.
